description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You are a god. You are angry. Time to smite some mortals. Use lightning bolts of divine retribution to completely level cities. But be careful! You only have limited charge. Take advantage of conduction, panicking people, stampeding elephants and more to destroy as much of each city as possible!
description.short: You are a god. You are angry. Time to smite some mortals. Use lightning bolts of divine retribution to completely level cities. But be careful! You only have limited charge. Take advantage of conduction, panicking people, stampeding elephants and more to destroy as much of each city as possible!
